        Game:
        ~~~~~
        Win the daily battle with the clock - become a bus driver! 

        Six true-to-life city buses, including two Lion's City buses 
        licensed by MAN, and a gigantic freely accessible world are 
        waiting for you in Bus Simulator 16. Transport your 
        passengers to their destinations across five authentic city 
        districts safely and on time. Drive a two-door, three-door, 
        or a true-to-life articulated bus through commuter traffic 
        at rush hour, watch out for emergency vehicles, and take 
        detours around construction sites. But watch out, or you 
        will get into trouble for accidents and traffic violations!
